page.title: 17Clubs - At the Golf Club
page.content: " Priors Hall Golf Club is hidden behind trees near the A43.The course fees are 220p for 18 holes on weekdays,& 320p at weekends.This money is paid to the club professional..who runs the golf shop sited near the first tee.Here the golfer can buy everything from a set of clubs to golfing socks. As so many people play on the course,an order of play has to be arranged.When golfers arrive they place a ball in a shute, and the order of the balls denotes the order of play. Players usually go round the course in groups of 2,3 or 4..and a game lasts between 3 & 4 hours,depending on the players ability. On completion of play,it is possible to enjoy a drink or a meal in the club house,which has panoramic views over the course." ....account provided by Peter Tinker (July 85)
